Javascript Unit testing page for OU sup sub editor

Summary

Description

This is a standalone page providing basic unit testing for the ousupsub editor. The summary and results are displayed after the pre defined tests are processed.

The tests focus on the editors ability to translate the given html into the correct response. Generally only failures are displayed as there are over 100 tests to process.

The results are disp in the table below in the four columns:

  • Input: The html string to be tested
  • Expected output: The html output we expect to see
  • Actual output: The html output we actually get
  • Mismatch?: Whether the expected and actual output actually match

Results

Input Expected output Actual output Matched
